title: spm-package
description: A spm.json file with package information

name.description: The name of the package. Needs to be unique in author's packages.

description.description: A short description of what the package does.

author.description: The author or authors of the package.

versions.description: The recommended versions of the package.

file.file: The file name of the this version.

changelog.description: The file name of the latest development version of the package.

latest.description: The latest recommended version of the package.
